subject: Re: Learning JUnit
msgSnippet: I am posting this message again with some more details. I need help on this issue. I would appreciate if someone helps me. I am designing a course on Testing.
messageBody:
I am posting this message again with some more details. I need help on
this issue. I would appreciate if someone helps me.

I am designing a course on Testing. The course should train the
participants on all the practical tools used for testing. The suggested
course contents are

1) Using Junit for unit testing
2) Mock objects. (Which is better JMock or EasyMock?)
3) DBUnit for database testing.
4) Web testing. (Which tool is the best HtmlUnit or JWebTest or
Selenium?)
5) Acceptance testing with FIT. (Is this tool used by many people?)

If possible, I would appreciate comments from the group regarding
topics to be added in /deleted from this course and also the questions
in the above message.
Thanks............Vijay
www.geocites.com/vijay_nathani
